üöÄ PayFill Auto is your go-to browser extension for seamless testing and development! Perfect for developers and testers, this extension effortlessly autofills test card details and payment information into checkout fields. Say goodbye to repetitive manual entry and hello to efficiency!

üîÑ Auto-fill Test Cards: Automatically fills in test credit card numbers, expiration dates, and CVV codes into checkout fields.

Why PayFill Auto?

	1.	Streamline Your Workflow: Spend less time entering test data and more time on developing and debugging your application.

How to Use:

	2.	Configure Your Settings: Open the extension settings to input your preferred test card details and other information.
	3.	Autofill Checkout Fields: Navigate to the checkout page of your application, and watch as PayFill Auto fills in the necessary details automatically.
